features: CURVE-HUGGING PIVOTING RAZOR HEAD: The curve-hugging pivoting razor blade design adjusts to shaving the legs, underarm, and bikini area contours. Finally, a razor for women that can remove body hair wherever you need.

TWIN BLADES GLIDE SMOOTHLY across skin to gently remove unwanted hair. The About Body Twin Blade shavers for women feature 2-blades and pads to preserve moisture for skin soft to the touch. Contains 12 disposable women's razors.

SOOTHING ALOE & VITAMIN E: These shaving razors are designed with an aloe & vitamin E strip for a luxurious shave. Gentle enough for sensitive skin, they silken and smooth skin while moisturizing to prevent dryness post-shave.

ENHANCED COMFORT AND CONTROL: These shaving razors have a long, cushion grip to provide enhanced comfort and control while shaving. Comfortably glide your razor along the area you want to remove hair for a flawless shave.

SUITABLE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: The ultra-thin blades on these razors are suitable for all skin types, so whether you have dry skin or sensitive skin, these razors will give you the smooth shave you're looking for.
body.description: Ladies, skip the pain and discomfort of waxing with the Kai About Face Body Twin Blade Pivoting Shave Razors with Aloe & Vitamin E lube strips. Our body razors are personal grooming products designed specifically for women to use along the legs and body, plus the delicate bikini area. With aloe & vitamin E strips and a pivoting razor head, our razors help to prevent and minimize dry skin, redness, and irritation. Gently remove unwanted hair for silky smooth skin. The blades are designed to be curve-hugging, so they fit every bend and contour of the body. The pivoting head adjusts to legs, underarms, and bikini line areas to glide effortlessly along the skin. These disposable razors for women ensure a close, comfortable shave and easy rinse. With each pass of the shaver, skin feels smooth, soft, and moisturized. Whether you're preparing for date night or simply going through your self-care routine, they soothe and smooth with every glide. The ultra-thin blades on these razors are suitable for all skin types, so whether you have dry skin or sensitive skin, these razors will give you the smooth shave you're looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Can't Shave The Fuzz Off a Peach
reviews.reviewText: Bought these not expecting much from 'em. Just needed something to shave my fur halfway decently. Didn't mind if it took multiple passes, even, so long as it eventually worked.What I've learned after using 10 of the 12 razors that came in this pack...they are Absolutely Useless for anyone with hair thicker than the finest spiderweb. (And even then you'll need five passes to get the hair shaved.) I threw away the last two because they were just that useless it wasn't worth the effort.As an example, attempts to shave my armpits resulted in still having 1/4cm hairs after over a dozen passes. Never did it shave anywhere near 'smooth'.They also left small cuts on my skin's curvier areas. How it did that without shaving the hair properly, I don't know. But I had unshaved hair and tiny cuts and that is Unacceptable.Save your money and buy a different brand of disposable razor. I bought a pack of cheaper ones marketed for men that do a massively better job. Which is just sad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Seem dull right out of the package.
reviews.reviewText: I usually toss razors when they take more than two passes to cut all the hair. These took 5 or 6 passes. Will not reorder.If you are looking for a low cost razor and don't mind taking five, six or more passes to shave, this is the item for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
